summary: Project with user activity tracking and reporting features. User requested reinsertion of a monthly report export button per user, including activities, with PDF and CSV/Excel formats, activity data, and month/year selector defaulting to current month.

existing_features.title: Add a month/year selector component (defaulting to the current month and year) that allows the user to pick any month before triggering the export. This selector should be accessible from the report list page or a dedicated export button area visible to the logged-in user.

Add an export button on the reports list page (ReportsListPage) that exports the current user's monthly report and all its associated activities. The export must support two formats: PDF (using the existing pdfGenerator utility) and CSV/Excel (using the existing excelGenerator utility). The exported data must include all activity fields for the selected month/year.

new_feature_requests.summary: Reinserir botão de exportar relatório mensal por utilizador com atividades, em PDF e CSV/Excel, com seletor de mês/ano (default: mês atual)
